title: Looking for a team to jam with, norms/flex dont matter :)
body:
IGN: Phy6 Flex is Gold 4, Solo/Duo is Plat 5
Placed silver this season and climbed to platinum in 2 ish months but never really advanced past that (not enough motivation, busy with work, etc). With voice chat being a possible implement to league i wanted to find some teams i can play in to improve my leadership skills, which i think will be integral especially in solo/duo if voice chat is put in. Willing to take charge and/or be a follower, im here to learn and improve :)
Willing to play any role, good at engage supports, Jayce, Fizz, Viktor, hyper carry adcs, and adc mids.
